name: Evan C.J.
desc: Since I remember I always wanted to be my own boss, running my own company seemed to be something almost impossible to achieve. My project was ready but I needed the financial support to start reaching a good market, then I discovered Money4You which helped my goal to become true.

name: Amanda W.
desc: The crowdfunding helped me to boost my sustainable energy project. People used to think that in order to achieve your goals you should work for a long time until you get enough money. The true is that there is always a better way to make it works. With Money4You I have been able to start my own business.
